sentences.en: As a result , many Himalayan, Hindu Kush and Karakoram glaciers are dwindling.
sentences.cn: 所以喜马拉雅山 、 兴都库什山和喀喇昆仑山的许多冰川都在逐渐萎缩.

sentences.en: But Berlin has just tiptoed over another red line, in the Hindu Kush mountains.
sentences.cn: 不过最近在阿富汗的兴都库什山脉,柏林却悄然踏过了另一条红线.

sentences.en: It is the oldest and largest Hindu temple in Singapore.
sentences.cn: 它是新加坡最古老和最大的兴都庙.

sentences.en: Language: Dutch is the official language. Other languages include English , Surinamese , Hindu Suriname Hindustani , and Javanese.
sentences.cn: 语言: 荷兰语为官方语言, 其它语言包括英语 、 苏里南兴都斯坦语和瓜哇语.

sentences.en: The general had mustered his troops north of the Hindu Kush.
sentences.cn: 将军在兴都库什山脉以北集结军队。

sentences.en: This structure is decorated with carvings of many Hindu deities.
sentences.cn: 这个结构上面有很多兴都神像的雕塑装饰著.

trans.tran_en: Hindu is used to describe things that belong or relate to Hinduism
